Pergolas & Shade Structures in Arlington, TX

JCustom Deck and Patio designs and builds exceptional pergolas for homeowners in Arlington and throughout Tarrant County. With over 20 years of experience across the DFW metroplex, we combine expert craftsmanship with premium materials to create outdoor spaces you'll enjoy for years to come.

Get a Free Quote

Pergolas & Shade Structures

Add elegance and functionality with custom pergolas in cedar, aluminum, or louvered designs. Our shade structures provide the perfect balance of sun and shade while enhancing your landscape's visual appeal.

From initial design consultation through final installation, our team manages every detail of your pergolas project. We use high-quality materials built to withstand North Texas weather and back every project with our satisfaction guarantee. Whether you're planning a complete backyard transformation or a focused upgrade, we'll work with you to create the right solution for your home in Arlington.
